content.raw:
Hi all,

I am trying to run the subt\_hello\_world tutorial. I have completed the `Native Installation` link first. Then trying to run `Single Vehicle Exploration w/ Object Detection and Base Station Reporting`. But I am getting below error while launching `helloworld_subt_launch` node.

‌

**process\[alpha/cartographer\_occupancy\_grid\_node-6\]: started with pid \[25226\]  
**`/home/baila/subt_hello_world/catkin_base_ws/install_isolated/lib/cartographer_ros/cartographer_node/home/baila/subt_hello_world/catkin_base_ws/install_isolated/lib/cartographer_ros/cartographer_occupancy_grid_node: error while loading shared libraries: libglog.so.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory`  
`: error while loading shared libraries: libglog.so.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory`  
`[alpha/cartographer_node-5] process has died [pid 25225, exit code 127, cmd /home/baila/subt_hello_world/catkin_base_ws/install_isolated/lib/cartographer_ros/cartographer_node -configuration_directory /home/baila/subt_hello_world/catkin_build_ws/src/helloworld_subt_launch/config/cartographer -configuration_basename cartographer_3d_alpha.lua scan:=front_scan points2:=points imu:=imu/data __name:=cartographer_node __log:=/home/baila/.ros/log/38eaf2fe-c9b8-11e9-9100-68a3c4a1e180/alpha-cartographer_node-5.log].`**  
log file: /home/baila/.ros/log/38eaf2fe-c9b8-11e9-9100-68a3c4a1e180/alpha-cartographer\_node-5\*.log  
\[alpha/cartographer\_occupancy\_grid\_node-6\] process has died \[pid 25226, exit code 127, cmd /home/baila/subt\_hello\_world/catkin\_base\_ws/install\_isolated/lib/cartographer\_ros/cartographer\_occupancy\_grid\_node -resolution 0.05 \_\_name:=cartographer\_occupancy\_grid\_node \_\_log:=/home/baila/.ros/log/38eaf2fe-c9b8-11e9-9100-68a3c4a1e180/alpha-cartographer\_occupancy\_grid\_node-6.log\].  
log file: /home/baila/.ros/log/38eaf2fe-c9b8-11e9-9100-68a3c4a1e180/alpha-cartographer\_occupancy\_grid\_node-6\*.log  
process\[alpha/pcl\_manager-7\]: started with pid \[25227\]**

‌

Can anyone tell me what is wrong here? Also, I did `catkin_make` at the step of `catkin build ` in Native Installation.
content.html:
Hi all,

I am trying to run the subt_hello_world tutorial. I have completed the Native Installation link first. Then trying to run Single Vehicle Exploration w/ Object Detection and Base Station Reporting. But I am getting below error while launching helloworld_subt_launch node.

‌

process[alpha/cartographer_occupancy_grid_node-6]: started with pid [25226]
/home/baila/subt_hello_world/catkin_base_ws/install_isolated/lib/cartographer_ros/cartographer_node/home/baila/subt_hello_world/catkin_base_ws/install_isolated/lib/cartographer_ros/cartographer_occupancy_grid_node: error while loading shared libraries: libglog.so.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
: error while loading shared libraries: libglog.so.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
[alpha/cartographer_node-5] process has died [pid 25225, exit code 127, cmd /home/baila/subt_hello_world/catkin_base_ws/install_isolated/lib/cartographer_ros/cartographer_node -configuration_directory /home/baila/subt_hello_world/catkin_build_ws/src/helloworld_subt_launch/config/cartographer -configuration_basename cartographer_3d_alpha.lua scan:=front_scan points2:=points imu:=imu/data __name:=cartographer_node __log:=/home/baila/.ros/log/38eaf2fe-c9b8-11e9-9100-68a3c4a1e180/alpha-cartographer_node-5.log].
log file: /home/baila/.ros/log/38eaf2fe-c9b8-11e9-9100-68a3c4a1e180/alpha-cartographer_node-5*.log
[alpha/cartographer_occupancy_grid_node-6] process has died [pid 25226, exit code 127, cmd /home/baila/subt_hello_world/catkin_base_ws/install_isolated/lib/cartographer_ros/cartographer_occupancy_grid_node -resolution 0.05 __name:=cartographer_occupancy_grid_node __log:=/home/baila/.ros/log/38eaf2fe-c9b8-11e9-9100-68a3c4a1e180/alpha-cartographer_occupancy_grid_node-6.log].
log file: /home/baila/.ros/log/38eaf2fe-c9b8-11e9-9100-68a3c4a1e180/alpha-cartographer_occupancy_grid_node-6*.log
process[alpha/pcl_manager-7]: started with pid [25227]

‌

Can anyone tell me what is wrong here? Also, I did catkin_make at the step of catkin build in Native Installation.
